text: Garda is a comune in the Province of Verona in the Veneto region in Italy. It is on the shore of Lake Garda. Garda is known for its beautiful bay surrounded by lush green hills, making it ideal for exploring the northern mountainous shores of the lake as well as southern lake towns and nearby wine regions. The town offers beaches like La Cavalla and the natural park and beach at Punta San Vigilio (Baia delle Sirene). Category:Settlements in Verona
title: Garda, Veneto
